name: Devoid (Chao)
description:
Become a soul keeper!

Devoid is a 2D platformer where you collect souls from exploring and solving puzzles. The game behaves like a platformer when you're in the white zone, however, when you enter the black zone, you become a ghost and you are able to float freely around the stage. Made during the University of Washington Game Development Club's duality themed game jam in Winter 2020.  Can also be purchased in the bundle (Not available yet)!

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Space: Jump / Propel
